mapper.select: select * from board order by boardID desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
mapper.insert: insert into board(boardID, userID, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardView, boardLike) values(#{boardID}, #{userID}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, now(), 0, 0)
mapper.update: update board set boardLike = boardLike+1 where boardID = #{boardID}
